# <a name="how-to-remove-autogenerated-columns-from-a-windows-forms-datagridview-control"></a><span data-ttu-id="725ba-102">Filtrar para quitar columnas generadas automáticamente de un control DataGridView de formularios Windows Forms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="725ba-102">How to: Remove Autogenerated Columns from a Windows Forms DataGridView Control</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="725ba-103">Cuando su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control está establecido para generar automáticamente las columnas basadas en datos de su origen de datos, puede omitir ciertas columnas de forma selectiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="725ba-103">When your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to autogenerate its columns based on data from its data source, you can selectively omit certain columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="725ba-104">Puede hacerlo mediante una llamada a la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> método en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> colección.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="725ba-104">You can do this by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="725ba-105">Como alternativa, puede ocultar las columnas de vista estableciendo el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> propiedad `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="725ba-105">Alternatively, you can hide columns from view by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="725ba-106">Esta técnica es útil cuando desea mostrar las columnas ocultas en determinadas condiciones, o cuando necesite tener acceso a los datos de las columnas sin mostrarlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="725ba-106">This technique is useful when you want to display the hidden columns in certain conditions, or when you need to access the data in the columns without displaying it.</span></span>  
  
### <a name="to-remove-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="725ba-107">Para quitar columnas generadas automáticamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="725ba-107">To remove autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="725ba-108">Llame a la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> método en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> colección.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="725ba-108">Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#111)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#111)]  
  
### <a name="to-hide-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="725ba-109">Para ocultar las columnas generadas automáticamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="725ba-109">To hide autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="725ba-110">Establezca la columna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> propiedad `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="725ba-110">Set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#112)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#112)]

## <a name="compiling-the-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="725ba-112">Compilar el código</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="725ba-112">Compiling the Code</span></span>  
 <span data-ttu-id="725ba-113">Para este ejemplo se necesita:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="725ba-113">This example requires:</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="725ba-114">Un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control denominado `dataGridView1` enlazada a una tabla que contiene `Fax` y `CustomerID` columnas, como el `Customers` tabla en la base de datos de ejemplo Northwind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="725ba-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control named `dataGridView1` bound to a table that contains `Fax` and `CustomerID` columns, such as the `Customers` table in the Northwind sample database.</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="725ba-115">Referencias a los ensamblados <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType>.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="725ba-115">References to the <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> assemblies.</span></span>
